The window for a peaceful negotiation is closing very fast, Raila Odinga told reporters on returning to Kenya.`` We will continue to walk the extra mile to find a peaceful resolution... Factor is well supported on both sides of the border.`` I know from my experience of the Young Star Search there is no shortage of talent in Northern Ireland,'' he said. There will potentially be no representation from Ireland, north or south, which is a bit rich given how loyal people here are to the show. Simon Cowell has made no secret of the fact that he was underwhelmed by what Dublin had to offer- and it is believed to be under his orders that X Factor has axed the Irish leg.

to what the competitors will sing, how they will sing it and more.`` That means you have to work with them up to five or six days a week,'' Simon Cowell points out. So, I need to find someone willing to make that commitment because it is hard work.... It is important to me that I have people I can trust in terms of their expertise and their gut feeling. It is a difficult decision when you are putting a team around you. I also think it is important on show like this that you have people who are competitive with each other because essentially, the judges are taking part in this competition as well as the competitors.
